mapper.select: select * from qna order by board_no desc

select r.* from (select rownum rn, a.* from (select * from qna b where
title like '%' ||#{keyword}|| '%'
user_id like '%' ||#{keyword}|| '%'
title like '%' ||#{keyword}|| '%' or user_id like '%' ||#{keyword}|| '%'
order by b.board_no desc) a
where rownum <= (#{page} * 12) or #{page} = 0)r
where r.rn > (#{page} - 1) * 12

select count(1) from qna where
title like '%' ||#{keyword}|| '%'
user_id like '%' ||#{keyword}|| '%'
title like '%' ||#{keyword}|| '%' or user_id like '%' ||#{keyword}|| '%'
mapper.insert: insert into qna (board_no, user_id, title, content, create_date, board_pw) values (qna_no_seq.nextval, #{userId}, #{title}, #{content}, sysdate, #{boardPw})
